metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
Sets the time name for analysis

properties.description: @{workbookKey=PingFederateWorkbook; logoFileName=PingIdentity.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=PingFederate; templateRelativePath=PingFederate.json; subtitle=; provider=Microsoft}.description
PingFederateAuthUrls_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomString1)
| summarize count() by DeviceCustomString1
| project URL = DeviceCustomString1, Total = count_
| extend UrlCustomEntity = URL

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for authentication URLs used.

properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| extend EventResultDetails = extract(@'description=(.*?),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| where isnotempty(EventResultDetails) or EventMessage contains "fail"
| summarize count() by DstUserName
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for failed authentication events

properties.description: PingFederateNewUsers_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
let known_users = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(30d) .. (1d))
| where isnotempty(DstUserName)
| summarize makeset(DstUserName);
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(DstUserName)
| where DstUserName !in (known_users)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventType =~ 'PWD_RESET_REQUEST' or EventSubType =~ 'PWD_RESET_REQUEST'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for password reset requests events.

properties.description: PingFederateRareSources_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Rare source IP addresses
properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr
| top 10 by count_ asc
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for rare source IP addresses of requests

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Rare source IP addresses

properties.description: PingFederateSAMLSubjects_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| extend SamlSubject = extract(@'SAML_SUBJECT==(\w+),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| where isnotempty(SamlSubject)
| summarize count() by SamlSubject, SrcIpAddr
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for SAML subjects used in requests

properties.description: PingFederateTopSources_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Top source IP addresses
properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for source IP addresses with the most requests

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Top source IP addresses

properties.description: PingFederateUnusualCountry_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Requests from unusual countries
properties.query:
let known_geo = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(30d) .. (1d))
| where isnotempty(DstGeoCountry)
| summarize makeset(DstGeoCountry);
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(DstGeoCountry)
| where DstGeoCountry !in (known_geo)
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for requests from unusual countries.

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Requests from unusual countries

properties.description: PingFederateUnusualSources_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Authentication from unusual sources
properties.query:
let known_src = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(30d) .. (1d))
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize makeset(SrcIpAddr);
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| where SrcIpAddr !in (known_src)
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for unusual sources of authentication.

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Authentication from unusual sources
Ping Federate - Users recently reseted password
properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventType =~ 'PWD_RESET' or EventSubType =~ 'PWD_RESET'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for users who recently reseted their passwords.

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Users recently reseted password

Refer to [PingFederate documentation](https://docs.pingidentity.com/bundle/pingfederate-102/page/tle1564002955874.html) for more information.

PingFederateEvent
 | summarize count() by DvcHostname
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: CommonSecurityLog (PingFederate)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
PingFederateEvent
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
| where isnotempty(Time)

value:
PingFederateEvent
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
| project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**PingFederateEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-PingFederate-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

Install and configure the Linux agent to collect your Common Event Format (CEF) Syslog messages and forward them to Microsoft Sentinel.

> Notice that the data from all regions will be stored in the selected workspace

innerSteps.title: 1.1 Select or create a Linux machine
innerSteps.description: Select or create a Linux machine that Microsoft Sentinel will use as the proxy between your security solution and Microsoft Sentinel this machine can be on your on-prem environment, Azure or other clouds.

innerSteps.title: 1.2 Install the CEF collector on the Linux machine
innerSteps.description:
Install the Microsoft Monitoring Agent on your Linux machine and configure the machine to listen on the necessary port and forward messages to your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. The CEF collector collects CEF messages on port 514 TCP.

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version.

> 2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine.

parameters.label: Run the following command to install and apply the CEF collector:

instructionSteps.title: 1. Linux Syslog agent configuration

instructionSteps.description: [Follow these steps](https://docs.pingidentity.com/bundle/pingfederate-102/page/gsn1564002980953.html) to configure PingFederate sending audit log via syslog in CEF format.
instructionSteps.title: 2. Forward Common Event Format (CEF) logs to Syslog agent

instructionSteps.description:
Follow the instructions to validate your connectivity:

Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the CommonSecurityLog schema.

>It may take about 20 minutes until the connection streams data to your workspace.

If the logs are not received, run the following connectivity validation script:

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version

>2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine

parameters.label: Run the following command to validate your connectivity:

instructionSteps.title: 3. Validate connection

instructionSteps.description:
Make sure to configure the machine's security according to your organization's security policy


[Learn more >](https://aka.ms/SecureCEF)
instructionSteps.title: 4. Secure your machine

connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [PingFederate](https://www.pingidentity.com/en/software/pingfederate.html) data connector provides the capability to ingest [PingFederate events](https://docs.pingidentity.com/bundle/pingfederate-102/page/lly1564002980532.html) into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer to [PingFederate documentation](https://docs.pingidentity.com/bundle/pingfederate-102/page/tle1564002955874.html) for more information.
connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function to work as expected [**PingFederateEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-PingFederate-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

graphQueries.baseQuery:
CommonSecurityLog
 |where DeviceProduct has 'PingFederate'
  |extend sent_by_ama = column_ifexists('CollectorHostName','')
 |where isnotempty(sent_by_ama)

sampleQueries.query:
PingFederateEvent
 | summarize count() by DvcHostname
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: CommonSecurityLog (PingFederate)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CommonSecurityLog
 |where DeviceProduct has 'PingFederate'
  |extend sent_by_ama = column_ifexists('CollectorHostName','')
 |where isnotempty(sent_by_ama)
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
CommonSecurityLog
 |where DeviceProduct has 'PingFederate'
  |extend sent_by_ama = column_ifexists('CollectorHostName','')
 |where isnotempty(sent_by_ama)
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
 | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

customs.description: To collect data from non-Azure VMs, they must have Azure Arc installed and enabled. [Learn more](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/agents/azure-monitor-agent-install?tabs=ARMAgentPowerShell,PowerShellWindows,PowerShellWindowsArc,CLIWindows,CLIWindowsArc)

Common Event Format (CEF) via AMA and Syslog via AMA data connectors must be installed [Learn more](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama#open-the-connector-page-and-create-the-dcr)

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**PingFederateEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-PingFederate-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

parameters.title: 1. Kindly follow the steps to configure the data connector

instructionSteps.title: Step A. Configure the Common Event Format (CEF) via AMA data connector
instructionSteps.description:
_Note:- CEF logs are collected only from Linux Agents_

1. Navigate to Microsoft Sentinel workspace ---> configuration ---> Data connector blade .

2. Search for 'Common Event Format (CEF) via AMA' data connector and open it.

3. Check If there is no existing DCR configured to collect required facility of logs, Create a new DCR (Data Collection Rule)

	_Note:- It is recommended to install minimum 1.27 version of AMA agent [Learn more](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/agents/azure-monitor-agent-manage?tabs=azure-portal ) and ensure there is no duplicate DCR as it can cause log duplicacy_

4. Run the command provided in the CEF via AMA data connector page to configure the CEF collector on the machine

instructionSteps.title: Step B. Forward Common Event Format (CEF) logs to Syslog agent
instructionSteps.description: [Follow these steps](https://docs.pingidentity.com/bundle/pingfederate-102/page/gsn1564002980953.html) to configure PingFederate sending audit log via syslog in CEF format.

instructionSteps.title: Step C. Validate connection
instructionSteps.description:
Follow the instructions to validate your connectivity:

Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the CommonSecurityLog schema.

It may take about 20 minutes until the connection streams data to your workspace.

If the logs are not received, run the following connectivity validation script:

 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version

2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine

parameters.label: Run the following command to validate your connectivity:

instructionSteps.description:
Make sure to configure the machine's security according to your organization's security policy


[Learn more >](https://aka.ms/SecureCEF)
instructionSteps.title: 2. Secure your machine

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function to work as expected [**PingFederateEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-PingFederate-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

properties.description: Detects abnormal password reset attempts for user in short period of time.
properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Abnormal password reset attempts
properties.query:
let threshold = 10;
PingFederateEvent
| where EventType =~ 'PWD_RESET_REQUEST'
| summarize count() by DstUserName, bin(TimeGenerated, 30m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Abnormal password reset attempts

properties.description: Detects authentication requests from new IP address.
properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Authentication from new IP.
properties.query:
let known_src = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. (1d))
| where EventType in~ ('AUTHN_ATTEMPT', 'SSO')
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize makeset(SrcIpAddr);
PingFederateEvent
| where EventType in~ ('AUTHN_ATTEMPT', 'SSO')
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| where SrcIpAddr !in (known_src)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Authentication from new IP.

properties.query:
let forbidden_geo = dynamic(['CH']);
PingFederateEvent
| where isnotempty(DstGeoCountry)
| where tostring(DstGeoCountry) in~ (forbidden_geo)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Detects multiple password reset for user.
properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Abnormal password resets for user
properties.query:
let threshold = 10;
PingFederateEvent
| where EventType =~ 'PWD_RESET'
| summarize count() by DstUserName
| where count_ > threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Abnormal password resets for user

properties.description: PingFederateNewUserSSO_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Detects new user SSO success login.
properties.displayName: Ping Federate - New user SSO success login
properties.query:
let known_usrs = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. (1d))
| where isnotempty(DstUserName)
| summarize makeset(DstUserName);
PingFederateEvent
| where EventType =~ 'SSO'
| where EventMessage has 'success'
| where DstUserName !in (known_usrs)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - New user SSO success login

properties.description: PingFederateOauthOld_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Detects requests using not the latest version of OAuth protocol.
properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomString3)
| extend proto = extract(@'(OAuth)', 1, DeviceCustomString3)
| extend ver = extract(@'(\d+)', 1, DeviceCustomString3)
| where proto =~ 'OAuth'
| where ver !~ '20'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Detects password reset requests from unexpected source IP address.
properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Password reset request from unexpected source IP address..
properties.query:
let known_src = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. (1d))
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize makeset(SrcIpAddr);
PingFederateEvent
| where EventType =~ 'PWD_RESET_REQUEST'
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| where SrcIpAddr !in (known_src)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Password reset request from unexpected source IP address..

properties.description: PingFederateSamlOld_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Detects requests using not the latest version of SAML protocol.
properties.query:
PingFederateEvent
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomString3)
| extend proto = extract(@'(SAML)', 1, DeviceCustomString3)
| extend ver = extract(@'(\d+)', 1, DeviceCustomString3)
| where proto =~ 'SAML'
| where ver !~ '20'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

let known_domains = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. (1d))
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomString1)
| extend url_parsed = parse_url(DeviceCustomString1)
| extend url_domain = extract(@'.*\.(.*\.[a-z]+)', 1, tostring(url_parsed.Host))
| summarize makeset(url_domain);
PingFederateEvent
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomString1)
| extend url_parsed = parse_url(DeviceCustomString1)
| extend url_domain = extract(@'.*\.(.*\.[a-z]+)', 1, tostring(url_parsed.Host))
| where url_domain !in (known_domains)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Detects requests from different countries for user in shotr term.
properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Unexpected country for user
properties.query:
let known_countries = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(1d) .. (1h))
| where isnotempty(DstGeoCountry)
| summarize makeset(DstGeoCountry);
PingFederateEvent
| where isnotempty(DstGeoCountry)
| where DstGeoCountry !in (known_countries)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.displayName: Ping Federate - Unexpected country for user

properties.description: Detects unusual mail domain in authentication requests.
properties.query:
let known_domains = 
PingFederateEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. (1d))
| extend email = extract(@'email=(.*?),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| extend m_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, email)
| where isnotempty(m_domain)
| summarize makeset(m_domain);
PingFederateEvent
| extend email = extract(@'email=(.*?),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| extend m_domain = extract(@'@(.*)', 1, email)
| where isnotempty(m_domain)
| where m_domain !in (known_domains)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUserName
| extend IpCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: PingFederateEvent Data Parser with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct has 'PingFederate'
| extend EventVendor = DeviceVendor
| extend EventProduct = DeviceProduct
| extend EventProductVersion = DeviceVersion
| extend EventSeverity = LogSeverity
| extend SrcIpAddr = SourceIP
| extend SrcHostname = SourceHostName
| extend SrcUserName = SourceUserName
| extend EventMessage = Message
| extend EventSubType = DeviceEventClassID
| extend EventType = Activity
| extend DstUserName = DestinationUserID
| extend DstGeoCountry = extract(@'country=;?(\w+),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| extend EventResultDetails = extract(@'description=(.*?),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| extend DvcHostname = DeviceAddress
| project TimeGenerated
        , EventVendor
        , EventProduct
        , EventProductVersion
        , EventMessage
        , EventType
        , EventSubType
        , DstUserName
        , DstGeoCountry
        , DvcHostname
        , EventSeverity
        , SrcIpAddr
        , SrcHostname
        , SrcUserName
        , EventResultDetails
        , DeviceCustomString1Label
        , DeviceCustomString1
        , DeviceCustomString2Label
        , DeviceCustomString2
        , DeviceCustomString3Label
        , DeviceCustomString3
        , DeviceCustomString4Label
        , DeviceCustomString4
        , DeviceCustomString5Label
        , DeviceCustomString5
        , DeviceCustomString6Label
        , DeviceCustomString6
        , AdditionalExtensions

CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct has 'PingFederate'
| extend EventVendor = DeviceVendor
| extend EventProduct = DeviceProduct
| extend EventProductVersion = DeviceVersion
| extend EventSeverity = LogSeverity
| extend SrcIpAddr = SourceIP
| extend SrcHostname = SourceHostName
| extend SrcUserName = SourceUserName
| extend EventMessage = Message
| extend EventSubType = DeviceEventClassID
| extend EventType = Activity
| extend DstUserName = DestinationUserID
| extend DstGeoCountry = extract(@'country=;?(\w+),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| extend EventResultDetails = extract(@'description=(.*?),.*', 1, AdditionalExtensions)
| extend DvcHostname = DeviceAddress
| project TimeGenerated
        , EventVendor
        , EventProduct
        , EventProductVersion
        , EventMessage
        , EventType
        , EventSubType
        , DstUserName
        , DstGeoCountry
        , DvcHostname
        , EventSeverity
        , SrcIpAddr
        , SrcHostname
        , SrcUserName
        , EventResultDetails
        , DeviceCustomString1Label
        , DeviceCustomString1
        , DeviceCustomString2Label
        , DeviceCustomString2
        , DeviceCustomString3Label
        , DeviceCustomString3
        , DeviceCustomString4Label
        , DeviceCustomString4
        , DeviceCustomString5Label
        , DeviceCustomString5
        , DeviceCustomString6Label
        , DeviceCustomString6
        , AdditionalExtensions

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The PingFederate solution provides the capability to ingest PingFederate events into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer to PingFederate documentation for more information.

  1. PingFederate via AMA - This data connector helps in ingesting PingFederate logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent here. Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector.

  2. PingFederate via Legacy Agent - This data connector helps in ingesting PingFederate logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

NOTE: Microsoft recommends installation of PingFederate via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by Aug 31, 2024, and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost more details.

Data Connectors: 2, Parsers: 1, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 11, Hunting Queries: 10

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
